DOC.brief_summary: Fractional Co2-laser for treatment of mature caesarean section scars.
DOC.brief_title: CO2-laser Treatment for Caesarean Section Scars
DOC.detailed_description: Randomized split scar study to document improvement of caesarean section scars as compared to untreated control scar.
DOC.criteria: mature caesarean section scar systemic uncontrolled disease recent or current cancer smoking keloid formation wounds or local disease int treatment area pregnancy or lactation
